title: French singer "Stromae" font
content:
Hello,  
The french singer Stromae uses amazing backgrounds and Tools of communication to promote and for his covers. Could you tell me what's the font he used ?  
Maybe it could help : for his first album he used Century Gothic. It seems this font looks like the font i'm looking for.

Do you have any idea of the name of this font ?

Thank you for your help !

J.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Stromae-Papaoutai.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425021659/http:/typophile.com/files/Stromae-Papaoutai.png) | 136.81 KB |
author: MandateMyAss

comments.content: It shares similarity in the concept with [Zelek MN](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425021659/http:/typophile.com/node/34968).
